title: Honor lvl 0
body:
My account got lvl 0 honor
And i got 14 day suspension
I was very r%%%%%ed.
Can someone tell me 
Is the same progress needed to get from honor 0 to 1 ,and from 1 to 2
Bcs i didnt hit lvl 3 yet, will it last so long to get from honor 0 to 1 just like from lvl 2 to 3?

replies.body:
I can't tell how long it will take for your Honor to recover back to Lv 2. For now, all I can say is keep focusing on being positive in game; it's good that you recognize where you went wrong, and if you keep trying we're sure that climbing back will feel like a breeze.

For now, I recommend setting goals for yourself like first Unlocking your Honor level if it isn't already, and setting precautions for when you feel yourself about to be negative in game (one good way of keeping yourself from flaming is to mute players and then drag chat off screen. Works wonders, I tell ya'!).

You'll be back to Lv 2 before you know it as long as you keep your H-game on from here forward! :D
